授業目的: This course introduces students to the academic study of contemporary Japanese religious practice. By stressing the combination of concepts, analysis, and empirical observations, it encourages students to approach Japanese religion critically, comparatively, and in context.
到達目標: By taking this course, students will gain a deepened understanding of the methods and theories of the study of Japanese religion as part of a broader inquiry into religion and Japanese society as academic disciplines.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Student presentations, group discussions, mini lectuers
